description: Siberian bugloss (Brunnera macrophylla 'Looking Glass') is an amazing plant species with its bright white-edged silver leaves and small, delicate, blue forget-me-not-like flowers. The largest leaves of the plant can reach up to six inches! This shade-loving plant thrives in woodland and can provide beauty to any shaded garden or patio. In warmer climates, it can become evergreen during the winter. This hardy perennial bears up to 14 days of flowering in the spring and provides an array of lovely foliage colors ranging from yellow to dark green. It's easy to maintain and can handle a variety of soil types. 'Looking Glass' offers a beautiful groundcover and lovely addition to any outdoor oasis.
